description: The perfect tool for agile team task estimation, no matter where team members are located.

features.title: Why use Poker Planning Pro?
features.realtimeDescription: All team members can vote simultaneously and see results in real-time, facilitating discussion and consensus.
features.remoteDescription: We support Fibonacci, T-shirt Sizing, Powers of 2, and more, adapting to your team's preferred methodology.
features.analyticsDescription: Get detailed statistics on estimations to improve accuracy in future sprints.

cta.title: Ready to improve your Planning Poker sessions?
cta.description: Sign up today and start enjoying all the benefits of Poker Planning Pro.

free.title: Free Plan
free.description: Ideal for small teams or to try the platform.

pro.title: Pro Plan
pro.description: For medium-sized teams with advanced needs.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Plan
enterprise.description: Complete solution for large teams and companies.

demo.title: See Poker Planning Pro in action
demo.subtitle: Complete flow of a Planning Poker session
demo.description: Watch how a team creates a room, adds issues, votes, and reveals estimations in real-time. Experience the simplicity and efficiency of Poker Planning Pro.

guest.title: Thank you for trying Poker Planning Pro!
guest.description: As a guest user, you can join existing rooms using an invitation code, but you cannot create new rooms.
guest.joinRoomTitle: Do you have a room code?
guest.joinRoomDescription: You can join an existing room using the code that was shared with you.
guest.alert: You have logged in as a guest. To create rooms or access all features, you need to register.

adBlocker.addException: Or add an exception for this domain

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing or using Poker Planning Pro ("the application"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access the application.
terms.section2Content: Poker Planning Pro is a web application that allows teams to conduct Planning Poker sessions to estimate tasks in agile projects. We offer different subscription plans with various features and limitations.
terms.section3Content: To access certain features of the application, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.section4Content1: We offer a free plan and paid plans (Pro and Enterprise). Payments are processed through third-party payment service providers. By subscribing to a paid plan, you agree to pay all fees associated with your plan.
terms.section4Content2: Subscriptions automatically renew unless you cancel them before the renewal date. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.
terms.section5Content: Free plan users will see ads provided by Google AdSense. These ads are subject to Google's privacy policy. Paid plans include the "Ad-free" feature.
terms.section6Content: The application and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Resyst Softwares and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.section7Content: You retain all rights to the content you create, upload, or share through the application. By providing content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, transmit, and display such content.
terms.section8Content: You agree not to use the application to:
section8List: Infringe on third-party intellectual property rights
Transmit illegal, abusive, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable material
Transmit viruses, trojans, or other malicious code
Interfere with the normal operation of the application
terms.section9Content: In no event shall Resyst Softwares, its directors, employees, or agents be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, punitive, or consequential damages arising from the use of the application.
terms.section10Content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these terms at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page.
terms.section11Content: These terms will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Chile, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.section12Content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: Poker Planning Pro ("we", "our", or "the application") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our web application.
privacy.section2Content: We collect various types of information, including:

section2List.title: Account information:
section2List.content: When you register, we collect your name, email address, and password.

section2List.title: Profile information:
section2List.content: Profile picture, job title, company, and other information you choose to provide.

section2List.title: Usage information:
section2List.content: Data about how you interact with our application, including the rooms you create or join, the estimates you make, etc.

section2List.title: Technical information:
section2List.content: IP address, browser type, device, operating system, and similar data.

privacy.section3Content: We use Google AdSense, an advertising service provided by Google LLC, to display ads in our application. Google AdSense uses cookies and similar technologies to display relevant ads to users.
privacy.section3Content2: Google AdSense may use the following information:
section3List: Cookies to track your browsing activity and display personalized ads.
Your IP address to approximate your location and ensure ads are relevant to your region.
Information about your device and browser to optimize ad display.
privacy.section3Content3: You can opt out of using the DART cookie for interest-based advertising by visiting the
privacy.section3Content4: For more information about how Google uses information collected through AdSense, visit the

section4List.title: Free Plan:
section4List.content: Free plan users will see ads provided by Google AdSense.

section4List.title: Pro and Enterprise Plans:
section4List.content: These paid plans include the "Ad-free" feature, which means users with these plans will not see ads in the application.

privacy.section5Content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. By using our application, you agree to the use of these technologies.
privacy.section6Content: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

section6List.title: Service providers:
section6List.content: We share information with third parties that help us operate, provide, improve, integrate, customize, and promote our application.

section6List.title: Legal compliance:
section6List.content: We may disclose information if we believe in good faith that it is necessary to comply with the law, protect our rights, or prevent fraud or abuse.

privacy.section7Content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights related to your personal data, such as:
section7List: Object to the processing of your data
privacy.section8Content: We implement security measures designed to protect your information. However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.
privacy.section9Content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy.section10Content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
